title: What is the most heart touching romantic song ever? - Quora

response.answer_text: Some of the best are those about love lost, rather than love won. So it depends very much on the message. Frankly, I am always moved by Carole King's version of her own "Will You Love Me Tomorrow." But "If" by Bread is a very reliable and beautifully written song about love, which has won many awards for its songsmith, David Gates. And if you don't get all choked up by "I Can't Make You Love Me" as performed by Bonnie Raitt, well then I just don't know. I published a list of some really great ones, which you can refer to.
For though they may be parted, There is still a chance that they will see, There will be an answer, let it be..
